attributes.action: issue shares to tax payers for bailing out banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is it not just a liberty to state the tax payer will bail out high street banks with an increase in taxes.
As this will undoubtedly come to fruition should not the tax payer see some return to this forced investment and the Government issue shares to each and every tax payer
